⺅.hint: The left-side person radical (にんべん)

⺈.hint: A small blade at the top

⺖.hint: The left-side heart radical (りっしんべん)

⺡.hint: The left-side water radical (さんずい)

⺨.hint: The left-side dog/animal radical (けものへん)

⺭.hint: The left-side spirit/altar radical (しめすへん)

⺾.hint: Grass or plants growing (くさかんむり)

⻂.hint: The left-side clothing radical (ころもへん)

⻏.hint: The right-side city/village radical (おおざと)

⻖.hint: The left-side hill/mound radical (こざとへん)

マ.hint: The katakana マ (ma) — two strokes like a swooping check mark

ユ.hint: The katakana ユ (yu) — a horizontal stroke with a vertical drop

ヨ.hint: Three horizontal prongs — the katakana ヨ (yo) looks like a rake

丂.hint: A stroke that bends or curves — something not straight

七.hint: The number seven — a bent stroke crossing a horizontal line

不.hint: Negation — a ceiling blocking upward movement

世.hint: Three decades side by side — the passing of time

丘.hint: An earthen hill — a raised bump in the landscape

丙.hint: The third heavenly stem — a frame with legs

丷.hint: Two small strokes pointing up like a pair of horns or antennae

丸.hint: A ball shape — something circular or complete

主.hint: A flame above a base — the lord, the main one, the host

乍.hint: Something happening abruptly — a burst of action

乎.hint: An exclamatory particle — a voice rising in wonder

九.hint: The number nine — curving stroke with a hook

也.hint: A curved tail shape — visually like a scorpion's stinger

亀.hint: The turtle character — shell, head, legs all visible

亅.hint: A vertical stroke with a hook at the bottom

争.hint: Hands grabbing at something — a struggle, a dispute

五.hint: The number five — crisscrossing strokes between two lines

亠.hint: A flat cover sitting on top — the topmost part

亡.hint: A person vanished — death, escape, loss

人.hint: A person with legs spread — the standalone form

今.hint: A roof sheltering a person in the present moment

介.hint: A person (人) with armor — something in between, mediating

儿.hint: Two little legs walking — the human legs radical at the bottom of characters

元.hint: Two legs (儿) supporting something above — the foundation, the beginning

兆.hint: Cracks in a tortoise shell — divination, a sign of things to come

公.hint: Eight (八) above private (ム) — opening up what was hidden

兵.hint: A hill (丘) above legs — troops marching into battle

冖.hint: A flat cover or lid on top

冬.hint: Ice crystals falling beneath a cover

凡.hint: A simple sail shape — plain, common, nothing special

凶.hint: An X inside a pit — bad luck, misfortune trapped in a box

出.hint: Mountains stacked — pushing up and out

刂.hint: The right-side sword radical (りっとう)

勿.hint: A slashed shape meaning 'do not' — like a warning sign

十.hint: A cross shape — the number ten

升.hint: Something going upward — to ascend, a measuring cup

卜.hint: A crack in an oracle bone

卩.hint: A kneeling person or official seal

厶.hint: A small coiled shape — something kept to oneself

去.hint: Earth (土) above legs — leaving the ground behind, going away

友.hint: Two hands reaching together — people helping each other

反.hint: A cliff (厂) with a hand — turning something over, opposing

叔.hint: A younger brother of one's parent — the family elder

口.hint: An open mouth or square opening

可.hint: A mouth (口) with a hook — approval, something permitted

史.hint: A hand holding a record — the chronicle keeper

右.hint: A hand (ナ) reaching for the mouth (口) — the right side

周.hint: Something enclosed and complete — going all the way around

咸.hint: A weapon (戈) with a mouth — the sharp taste of salt

品.hint: Three mouths stacked — many items, products, quality

囗.hint: A full enclosure — a fence or border

土.hint: A mound of earth on the ground

大.hint: A person with arms spread wide

天.hint: Above a person — the vast sky overhead

夫.hint: A person standing tall with a broad hat

寸.hint: A unit of measurement — the width of a thumb

寺.hint: Earth (土) above inch (寸) — sacred ground measured carefully

小.hint: A small thing with particles flying off

尸.hint: A body lying down — used in body/building kanji

尹.hint: A hand holding a staff — one who rules and administers

巛.hint: Three flowing curves — water coursing through a channel

巾.hint: A hanging piece of cloth or towel

市.hint: A covered trading area — where people buy and sell

布.hint: A hand spreading fabric — woven material, to spread out

广.hint: A lean-to shelter with a roof

廿.hint: Two tens side by side — the number twenty

彡.hint: Three flowing lines — hair or decoration

彦.hint: A handsome young man — a talented youth with flowing hair

彳.hint: The left half of a crossroads — a small step

心.hint: The standalone heart — feelings and mind

憂.hint: A heavy heart weighed down with sorrow

才.hint: A sprout just breaking through — natural ability emerging

攵.hint: A hand holding a stick to hit (ぼくづくり)

月.hint: The moon — also month and meat radical

木.hint: A tree with branches and roots

未.hint: A tree (木) with a shorter top branch — hasn't fully grown

本.hint: A tree (木) with a mark at the root — the origin, a book

束.hint: A tree (木) wrapped with a belt (口) — tied together

林.hint: Two trees (木木) side by side — a small forest

業.hint: A complex tower of strokes — work, profession, consequences

欠.hint: A person with mouth open — lacking

次.hint: Two strokes stepping forward in sequence

毎.hint: A mother (母) variant — each and every time

比.hint: Two figures side by side — measuring one against the other

民.hint: The common folk — an eye looking down at the populace

永.hint: Water flowing forever — this character contains all basic strokes

父.hint: A father — hand holding an axe

玉.hint: The king radical (王) with a dot — a precious stone held by royalty

王.hint: The three levels of heaven, earth, and man connected

瓜.hint: A vine with a fruit hanging — a gourd or melon

甘.hint: Something in the mouth — the taste of sweetness

生.hint: A plant sprouting from the ground — birth, growth, raw

用.hint: A fenced-in tool — something put to practical purpose

田.hint: A rice paddy divided into plots

由.hint: Something sprouting from a box — the origin or cause of things

申.hint: The monkey zodiac sign — a field (田) with a line through it

疒.hint: A person lying on a bed — illness

癶.hint: Two feet — the dotted cliff radical

百.hint: One on top of white — a complete count

直.hint: An eye (目) looking directly ahead with a vertical line — honest and direct

県.hint: A hanging eye — an administrative district (Japan-specific)

石.hint: A stone at the base of a cliff

禾.hint: A grain plant drooping with seeds

穴.hint: A cave or hole in the ground

立.hint: A person standing on the ground

羊.hint: Horns on top, a body below — a sheep seen from the front

義.hint: A sheep (羊) above self/me (我) — righteous sacrifice for the greater good

翟.hint: A long-tailed bird — feathers fanning out

耂.hint: The top part of 老 — old age

者.hint: A person of a certain kind — 'the one who...'

至.hint: An arrow reaching its target — to arrive at a destination

舌.hint: A tongue sticking out of a mouth

菐.hint: A rare component — grass growing thick and wild

虍.hint: The top of 虎 — tiger markings

西.hint: A bird settling into its nest at sunset

見.hint: An eye on legs — looking around

言.hint: Words coming from a mouth — the speech radical

豆.hint: A bean on a pedestal — ceremonial vessel

貝.hint: A cowrie shell — used as money

赤.hint: The color red — fire over earth

車.hint: A wheeled cart seen from above

釆.hint: Separating grain — to sort and distinguish, like panning for gold

重.hint: Layers stacked on the earth — weight pressing down

青.hint: Blue/green — the color of plants growing

韋.hint: Tanned animal hide — tough and flexible material

飛.hint: Wings spread wide, soaring through the air

食.hint: Food — a person at a vessel with a lid
